title: Person Of Interest: Almost Missed It
author: Amonia33
comment: He has the voice, the posture, and the attitude. All that left is a Bat Suit.
This was the best show ever. So sad it it over.
It is only now ,that it has ended,that I realise how much I loved this show.
That's is so classy the way they ended that scene, "Better call the police and a good divorce lawyer."
When this show started it was kind of far fetched, then Snowden revealed what the NSA was doing and then you realized it was almost a docu-drama.
description: Person of interest S01E02 - This Does Not Belong To Me. Picture courtesy of CBS.
